Doc-ID: $doc_id$
Title: $title$
Creator: $creator$
Keywords: $keywords$
Date: $pdate$
Content-Type: text/gingin; charset=$encoding$
URL: $base_url$GinGin_CGI.py/show_id_doc/$doc_id$
Trackback: $base_url$GinGin_BT.py/trackback/$doc_id$
Attach-URL: $base_url$GinGin_CGI.py/get_afile/$doc_id$

$doc_body$
